text: Wolfgang Schwarz (born 14 September 1947, in Vienna) is an Austrian figure skater. He retired in 1968. He won a gold medal at the 1968 Winter Olympics. He was one of the youngest male figure skating Olympic champions. He won two (1967, 1968) silver World Championships medals, and three (1967, 1968, 1969) silver European Championships medals. He was arrested for sex trafficking and kidnapping. == Other websites == * Category:1947 births Category:Austrian criminals Category:Figure skaters Category:Kidnappers Category:Living people Category:Olympic gold medalists Category:Sportspeople from Vienna
title: Wolfgang Schwarz
